description: Details of Condition 2 (delivery and service plan) for MSCP 2 submitted pursuant of planning permission 00558/A/P65 dated 24/08/2017 for Reserved matters application for the erection of a seven storey building comprising of multi storey car park and central logistics facility (Class B8 use - storage and distribution) with associated private link road, landscaping, servicing and plant within Parcel D following planning permission 00558/A/P55 dated 02.04.2015 which granted approval for minor material amendments to approved outline application 00558/A/P51 dated 20.12.2013 for demolition of existing buildings and structures and the development for a media broadcasting and production Campus of up to 104,670sqm (GIA) comprising office (Class BA1), studio production and research and development facilities (Class B1b) and warehouse/storage (Class B8); hard and soft landscaping; reconfigured and new vehicle and pedestrian accesses and works to the public highway; the provision of parking; and all necessary ancillary and enabling works, plant and equipment.
